subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace in Jaipur was built during the rule of Maharaja Jai Singh II?
question_hi: जो महाराजा जैसिंगी सी द्वारा बनायी गयी जापान की पहल क्या थी ?
C_en: Cenotaph of Maharaja Sawai Mansingh II
explanation_en: Amer Fort is the famous palace built during the reign of Maharaja Jai Singh II.
explanation_hi: आम्र फोट, महाराजा जैसी सृष्टियां का निर्माण
explanation_ar: Amer Fort is a famous palace constructed during the reign of Maharaja Jai Singh II.
